title: Drawing, "Floating Icebergs, July 6 and 16, 1859", 1859
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on light brown paper
inscribed: Written above: "July 6th" Written beneath the third drawing:"Under the sun at 5P.M." Bottom right: "July 16".
description: Top row: distant views of three icebergs; Second row: distant view of an iceberg; Third row: distant view of five icebergs; Bottom row: two drawings of a single iceberg

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Floating Icebergs, July 6 and 16, 1859", 1859.
1859. Graphite, brush and white gouache on light brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-284-c.
